text: is a Japanese football player for Azul Claro Numazu on loan from Mito HollyHock. ==Career== After attending Funabashi Municipal High School, Hasegawa joined Mito HollyHock in October 2017 for the successive season.http://www.mito-hollyhock.net/news/7100/ ==Club statistics== Updated to end of 2018 season.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 209 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
